description.lang: TechniSat's standalone Z-Wave smart home gateway, with WiFi and LAN connectivity will be the central hub of your smart home.The CONNECT app by TechniSat for smartphones and tablets lets you easily setup, view and control your smart home, even when your not at home.Not a fan of apps? Not a problem! Select TechniSat TVs and set-top boxes can connect to TechniSat smart home gateways via the local network to bring your smart home to the big screen TV. Putting easy view and control of your smart home at you fingertips with the click of a button on your remote control.
